quote: Your first 10,000 photographs are your worst.
name: Henri Cartier-Bresson

quote: Photography is an austere and blazing poetry of the real.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: The pictures are there, and you just take them.
name: Robert Capa

quote: The camera makes you forget you're there. It's not like you are hiding but you forget, you are just looking so much.
name: Annie Leibovitz

quote: A camera alone does not make a picture. To make a picture you need a camera, a photographer and above all a subject. It is the subject that determines the interest of the photograph.
name: Man Ray
